actor_awards.notes: She is the only actress in Academy Award history to be nominated for an Oscar for her first three films.

filmography.title: The Little Foxes
filmography.role_description: The innocent daughter of a ruthless Southern aristocrat who begins to see her family's corruption.
filmography.plot: The ruthless, money-grubbing Hubbard clan fights for control of a family business, with their young daughter caught in the middle.

filmography.title: Mrs. Miniver
filmography.role_description: The granddaughter of the village aristocrat who marries the Minivers' son and becomes a tragic casualty of the war.
filmography.plot: A British family struggles to survive the first months of World War II.

filmography.title: The Pride of the Yankees
filmography.role_description: The devoted and strong-willed wife of baseball legend Lou Gehrig.
filmography.plot: The story of the life and career of the famous baseball player Lou Gehrig.

filmography.title: Shadow of a Doubt
filmography.role_description: A bored teenager whose admiration for her visiting uncle turns to terror as she suspects him of being a serial killer.
filmography.plot: A young woman discovers her visiting uncle may not be the man he seems to be.

filmography.title: The Best Years of Our Lives
filmography.role_description: The daughter of a returning WWII sergeant who falls in love with a married veteran.
filmography.plot: Three World War II veterans return home to small-town America to discover that they and their families have changed.

filmography.title: The Men
filmography.role_description: The fiancée (and later wife) of a paralyzed war veteran who struggles to help him adjust to his new life.
filmography.plot: A paralyzed war veteran tries to adjust to the world without the use of his legs.

filmography.title: Pursued
filmography.role_description: A woman caught in a family feud who marries her adopted brother, unaware of the dark secrets of their past.
filmography.plot: A man plagued by nightmares and a hidden past is hunted by a mysterious figure in this psychological western.

filmography.title: Enchantment
filmography.role_description: An orphan raised by a wealthy family who falls in love with one of the sons.
filmography.plot: An elderly man recalls his past love and tries to help his great-niece avoid making the same mistakes.

filmography.title: The Actress
filmography.role_description: The supportive but worried mother of a young girl who dreams of becoming a stage actress.
filmography.plot: A teenage girl in the early 1900s is determined to become an actress despite her father's objections.

filmography.title: Casanova Brown
filmography.role_description: A woman whose brief marriage to a professor leads to a kidnapping caper involving their baby.
filmography.plot: A professor discovers he is a father just as he is about to marry another woman, leading him to kidnap his own child.

filmography.title: Somewhere in Time
filmography.role_description: The former housekeeper and confidante to the actress Elise McKenna who guards her secrets.
filmography.plot: A Chicago playwright uses self-hypnosis to travel back in time and meet the actress whose vintage portrait hangs in a grand hotel.

filmography.title: The Rainmaker
filmography.role_description: An eccentric, wealthy widow who rents a room to the young lawyer protagonist. (Her final film role)
filmography.plot: An underdog lawyer takes on a fraudulent insurance company.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Nomination – Best Supporting Actor (Jon Voight)

filmography.title: Track of the Cat
filmography.role_description: The spinster sister in a dysfunctional family isolated on a ranch during a snowstorm.
filmography.plot: A pioneer family is terrorized by a panther during a blizzard in Northern California.

filmography.title: The Steel Trap
filmography.role_description: The wife of a bank executive who is unaware that her husband has stolen money and is trying to flee the country.
filmography.plot: A bank executive steals a fortune and tries to escape to Brazil with his wife on a weekend, encountering numerous obstacles.

filmography.title: Count the Hours
filmography.role_description: The wife of a ranch hand wrongly accused of murder, who fights to prove his innocence.
filmography.plot: A lawyer defends a migrant worker accused of murdering a rancher and his housekeeper.

filmography.title: California Conquest
filmography.role_description: The daughter of a gunsmith who teams up with a Spanish nobleman to save California from Russian annexation.
filmography.plot: In 1840s California, a Don fights to stop a conspiracy to hand the territory over to the Russians.

filmography.title: The Search for Bridey Murphy
filmography.role_description: A housewife who, under hypnosis, recounts a previous life as an Irish woman named Bridey Murphy.
filmography.plot: A woman is hypnotized and begins to recall a past life in 19th-century Ireland.

filmography.title: Escapade in Japan
filmography.role_description: The mother of an American boy who survives a plane crash and goes on an adventure in Japan.
filmography.plot: Two young boys, one American and one Japanese, travel across Japan to reach the American boy's parents.

filmography.title: The Restless Years
filmography.role_description: An overprotective mother who tries to hide the truth about her husband's mental illness from her daughter.
filmography.plot: A high school girl is ostracized because of her father's past, while her boyfriend faces pressure from his own ambitious father.

filmography.title: Something to Live For
filmography.role_description: The wife of an advertising executive who becomes involved with a recovering alcoholic actress.
filmography.plot: An advertising executive tries to help an actress fight her alcoholism, but they fall in love.

filmography.title: The Happy Ending
filmography.role_description: The mother of the protagonist, representing the older generation's views on marriage.
filmography.plot: A disillusioned wife leaves her husband on their 16th anniversary to find herself.

filmography.title: The Good Mother
filmography.role_description: The grandmother of the main character, providing a link to the family's conservative past.
filmography.plot: A divorced mother risks losing custody of her daughter when she begins a relationship with a man who allows the child to touch him.

filmography.title: Roseland
filmography.role_description: A widow who finds comfort in the past and the music at the Roseland Ballroom.
filmography.plot: Three stories set in the famous Roseland Ballroom in New York City, focusing on the lives of the dancers.

filmography.title: The Imperfect Lady
filmography.role_description: A dancer who marries a politician but is haunted by a past scandal.
filmography.plot: A politician's career is threatened when his wife's past involvement with a murder trial comes to light.

filmography.title: The Trouble with Women
filmography.role_description: A female reporter who clashes with a psychology professor who believes women are inferior.
filmography.plot: A psychology professor who writes about women's inferiority is sued by a newspaper and tricked by a female reporter.

filmography.title: The Capture
filmography.role_description: The widow of a man wrongly killed, who marries the man responsible for his death.
filmography.plot: A man kills a robbery suspect, then marries the man's widow, but begins to suspect the dead man was innocent.
